00020 
00021 //! interpret a matrix or a vector as a diagonal matrix (i.e. off-diagonal entries are zero)
00022 // TODO: allow placement of vector onto a sub- or super- diagonal
00023 template<typename T1>
00024 arma_inline
00025 const Op<T1, op_diagmat>
00026 diagmat(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X)
00027   {
00028   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00029   
00030   return Op<T1, op_diagmat>(X.get_ref());
00031   }
00032

00035 //! @}
